title: Personalized Learning Environment (PLE) Design Process for Collaborative Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related foundational knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Establishing a socially collaborative and technology-integrated learning environment to enhance the competencies of current field professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply ADDIE model procedures step-by-step to design personalized learning environments (PLEs).
Learners can develop collaborative learning scenarios integrating digital technology and social interaction.
Learners can optimize PLE designs that integrate formal and informal learning resources for workplace applicability.

resources: Cloud-Based Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Microsoft Teams, etc.)
Online Community Platform for Promoting Social Learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
